page.title: 11INDUSTRY. HOLT.WORCS .
page.content: Sand and gravel has been quarried in Holt and at Top Barn Farm for nearly 40 years. From the 300 acre site, 150 acres of which are already quarried,200,000 tons are extracted annually and sold within a 30 mile radius. It is used by the building industry for pre-mixed concrete and pre-cast concrete. Of 30 employees all but three executives live locally. One of the older disused quarries is used by a private contractor as a rubbish tip;another is filled with water and used for farm irrigation, fishing and water sports. Malvern Hills Authority's conservation and safety policy now requires old quarries to be immediately filled in and cultivated.This slightly changes the original contour causing a dip on the sloping sides of which trees are planted.
